conversation.text: I'd highly recommend watching "Lord of the Flies." This classic film is a gripping exploration of human nature, as a group of schoolboys are stranded on an island and their civilized behavior slowly deteriorates. Or, if you're intrigued by mysteries and complex characters, "Heart of Darkness" might be a fascinating choice for you. This movie follows a police officer searching for a famous policeman who went missing under mysterious circumstances in the outskirts of Rio de Janeiro. Both films are engaging works of fiction that delve deep into the human condition. Enjoy the movies!
